intro: Lomaria krebsii, commonly known as the Schomburgk's lomaria, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Aizoaceae, commonly referred to as the ice plant family. It thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, adapting to poor soil conditions and high temperatures. Lomaria krebsii is often found in rocky or sandy soils, and it plays a role in stabilizing coastal and inland dunes.
